body_html: I actually don't fully understand this plan. IIRC the initial sketch was that we'd basically have a bunch of dynamically loaded modules that would be implementing different functionalities. Most notably, libcaffe2.so (with the C2 graph executors, etc.) was meant to be used by the production module, and not the basic package. Has that changed?
body_text: I actually don't fully understand this plan. body: I actually don't fully understand this plan. IIRC the initial sketch was that we'd basically have a bunch of dynamically loaded modules that would be implementing different functionalities. Most notably, `libcaffe2.so` (with the C2 graph executors, etc.) was meant to be used by the production module, and not the basic package. Has that changed?
